description: Gross pay and deduction consistency (gross minus deductions vs net)
Deduction breakdown sum mismatch (breakdown total != declared or gross minus net)
Net pay inconsistency (gross minus deductions != net)
Net pay upper bound (net exceeds gross minus minimum deductions)
Net equals gross while deductions present
USC exemption limit breach (taxable pay below threshold but USC deducted)
USC applied when taxable pay zero
PRSI threshold or rate breach by class
PAYE vs net sanity (total deductions vs gross minus net)
PAYE zero when taxable pay present
PAYE applied when taxable pay zero
